images.alt: SERGIK in desert landscape at golden hour overlooking Phoenix
images.description: Desert portrait at golden hour - contemplative profile view overlooking vast desert landscape with mountains, lake, and sparse desert vegetation. Warm golden light, reflective sunglasses, gold chain visible.

images.alt: SERGIK on rooftop at night with city lights
images.description: Urban rooftop portrait at night - man bun, full beard, heavily tattooed forearms, silver chain. Warm Edison string lights and city skyline bokeh in background. Relaxed, intimate evening setting.

images.alt: SERGIK performing with intense green stage lighting and geometric elements
images.description: Live performance with dramatic green lighting - bucket hat, Off-White jacket, orange-tinted sunglasses on chain. Geometric stage props with orange-red glow, crystalline reflective pillar. Pioneer DJ setup, warehouse/underground atmosphere.

images.alt: SERGIK in studio with red and yellow LED lighting
images.description: Studio session - fedora hat, SERGIK logo t-shirt, red tufted couch. Geometric LED light panels (hexagonal/diamond patterns) in yellow/orange/red/purple. Professional audio equipment, acoustic panels, DAW visible on laptop. Dog companion in foreground.

images.alt: SERGIK DJing with Pioneer equipment, purple and orange lighting
images.description: Performance from behind - Off-White jacket with four-arrow logo, bucket hat. Pioneer DJ equipment, dramatic purple and orange/yellow stage lighting with atmospheric haze. Club/warehouse setting.

images.alt: SERGIK portrait at sunset with palm trees
images.description: Sunset portrait - dark wavy hair, full beard, dark sunglasses. Hands clasped in contemplative gesture. Heavy forearm tattoos. Vibrant orange/yellow/pink sunset sky, palm tree silhouette. Desert/tropical evening atmosphere.

images.alt: SERGIK performing with intense red and blue lighting
images.description: Intense performance - profile view, bucket hat, Off-White jacket with diagonal stripes, Supreme logo visible. Pioneer DJ mixer in foreground. Dramatic red and blue stage lighting creating high-energy underground atmosphere. Active mixing, focused expression.

images.alt: Multiple performers on stage with red and blue lighting
images.description: Collaborative performance scene - three performers on stage. SERGIK in foreground with Pioneer DJ setup, red/blue lighting. Other performers with fedora hats, abstract graphic banner in background. Energetic underground electronic music event.

images.alt: Close-up of SERGIK performing with dramatic red-orange and blue lighting
images.description: Intimate close-up performance moment - full beard illuminated by blue light, over-ear headphones, dark cap. Jacket with angular chevron pattern on sleeve glowing red-orange. Vertical light streaks, deep blue ambient background. Focused, immersed in performance.
